main.title: KUKUDOCS | HTML5-based Document Apps
main.decs: KUKUDOCS provides various html5-based document solutions cloud document viewer, web editor, javascript document viewer.
main.keywords: HTML5, javascript, Cloud, Viewer, Document, wysisyg, editor, HTML5 Viewer, Javascript Viewer, document viewer, web editor
main.main-section-info:
Delivers optimized document solutions
based on innovative technology.
main.filter-info: Create optimized data for your browser by parsing the OOXML(Office Open XML) directly.
main.filter-info-sub: Provides faster, higher quality document viewers by unifying complex document structures by eliminating unnecessary elements that are not necessary for document representation.
main.rendering-info: We have technologies to render documents quickly and reliably in the browser.
main.rendering-info-sub: Complies with web standards, provides fast and reliable viewing through Layer Layout, Virtual DOM, Page Segmentation technology, and Image rendering technology.
main.product-sub-title: Experience the innovative technology of Kukudocs
main.product-viewer-title: Cloud Viewer based on SaaS APIs
main.product-viewer-info: This is a cloud document viewer that allows you to access various documents, such as MS Office, PDF, and Image, without commercial programs in Desktop and Mobile App.
main.product-editor-info: It is a web editor that develops selection and filtering technology directly from the way of web editor which depends on existing browser functions such as selection and copy and past.
main.product-js-info: This is a Javascript library where you can view documents of MS-Office 2007 or above with a web browser without a separate server.
main.customer-title: <span class='accent'>Introduces major customers who are experiencing innovative technologies of Kukudocs
product.support.title: REQUIREMENTS
product.support.server.title: server
product.support.client.title: Client
product.html5-viewer.title: Document Viewer based on SaaS APIs
product.html5-viewer.sub-title: This is a cloud document viewer solution that allows you to access various documents, such as MS Office, PDF, and Image, without commercial programs in Desktop and Mobile App.
product.html5-viewer.feature.title: FEATURES
product.html5-viewer.feature-1.title: Multi-platform & cross-browser
product.html5-viewer.feature-1.decs: Non-ActiveX based, allowing you to view documents anywhere, anytime, regardless of OS and Internet browser.
product.html5-viewer.feature-2.title: Supporting various document formats
product.html5-viewer.feature-2.decs: Supports more than 40 different document formats including Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Pdf, Hwp.
product.html5-viewer.feature-3.title: Easy sharing of documents
product.html5-viewer.feature-3.decs: You can easily share documents in Mail, Messenger, SNS, etc. by URL calling method.
product.html5-viewer.feature-4.title: Excellent document compatibility
product.html5-viewer.feature-4.decs: Through the Document Filter technique of Kukudocs, the document provides excellent document compatibility through direct parsing of documents.
product.html5-viewer.feature-5.title: Quick document viewing
product.html5-viewer.feature-5.decs: You can quickly check the document using the minimal HTML element for the document.
product.html5-viewer.feature-6.title: Expansibility
product.html5-viewer.feature-6.decs: You can configure HTML Element documents to link with various services such as search and translation.
product.html5-viewer.support.server.decs: Windows & Windows Server 2008 or later CentOS 6.x & Redhat 6.0 or later
product.html5-viewer.support.client.decs: OS: Windows, Linux, iOS, Android Browser: Chrome, Safari, IE, Firefox
product.web-editor.title: Web editor for web content creation
product.web-editor.sub-title: It is a web editor that develops selection and filtering technology directly from the way of web editor which depends on existing browser functions such as selection and copy and past.
product.web-editor.feature.title: Product Features
product.web-editor.feature-1.title: Follow Web standards
product.web-editor.feature-1.decs: Comply with web accessibility and web standards with HTML5-based web editor.
product.web-editor.feature-2.title: Cross-browsing
product.web-editor.feature-2.decs: Available in various browsers, such as Internet Explorer, Chrome, Firefox, Safari, etc..
product.web-editor.feature-3.title: realization of unrivaled selection
product.web-editor.feature-3.decs: You can control the selection directly, not just the text, but also the table selection.
product.web-editor.feature-4.title: High Compatibility Copy / Paste
product.web-editor.feature-4.decs: You can copy and paste data from MS Office, Area Hangul.
product.web-editor.feature-5.title: Powerful table features
product.web-editor.feature-5.decs: Not only cell merge / cell division, but also table formula calculation is supported.
product.web-editor.feature-6.title: Provides various templates
product.web-editor.feature-6.decs: You can easily create documents through various templates.
product.js-viewer.title: Only Javascript-based Document Viewer
product.js-viewer.sub-title: This is a Javascript library that allows you to browse Pdf & MS-Office 2007 or later documents without a separate server by using a web browser.
product.js-viewer.feature.title: Product Features
product.js-viewer.feature-1.title: Online & Offline
product.js-viewer.feature-1.decs: If you have an Internet browser, you can view documents online and offline without installing any programs.
product.js-viewer.feature-2.title: Superior security
product.js-viewer.feature-2.decs: You do not need to worry about server resources and security because you do not need a separate server to browse documents in your Internet browser.
product.js-viewer.feature-3.title: Easy installation
product.js-viewer.feature-3.decs: You can easily create a document viewer by downloading and importing a Javascript file. It is also system-independent, so you do not need to modify your existing system.
product.js-viewer.feature-4.title: High document compatibility
product.js-viewer.feature-4.decs: Based on the technology of Kukudaks HTML5 integrated viewer and image rendering technology that can render image file which can not be verified by browser such as wmf, tiff, etc., Web browser provides high document compatibility.
product.js-viewer-extension.title: SlideJS Extension Server
product.js-viewer-extension.sub-title: SlideJS Extension Server is an expansion server for SlideJS. Word, Excel, PowerPoint documents can be converted to PDF documents.
product.js-viewer-extension.feature-1.de: SlideJS uses Word, Excel and Powerpoint documents for better quality and compatibility.
product.js-viewer-extension.feature-2.de: Extension Server Connector API makes it easy to convert doc, xls, ppt documents to pdf, docx, xlsx, pptx.
product.js-viewer-extension.feature-3.de: You can easily work with your business logic. You can convert from a terminal in Command Line mode, or you can run it as a web server.
product.js-viewer-extension.feature-4.de: Multi-platform support. It can run on Windows, Linux, and MacOS, and runs on all operating systems with one product.

demo.js-viewer.title: DOCXJS Javascript Office and PDF Viewer
demo.js-viewer.description: Use HTML5 to display MS-Office 2007(Word:docx, Excel:xlsx, PowerPoint:pptx) & PDF files directly in browser.
demo.js-viewer.keyword: docx, xlsx, pptx, pdf, office, office viewer, pdf viewer, javascript viewer, js viewer
demo.js-viewer.sub-title: Kukudocs JS Document Viewer is a Javascript-based web document viewer that does not require a server.
demo.js-viewer.decs1: * The file is not sent to the server and is processed on web browser.
demo.js-viewer.decs2: * Be sure to try the demo on a browser. You can view .docx, .xlsx, .pptx, .pdf files.
tutorial.title: Getting Started: Kukudocs JS Document Viewer!
tutorial.subtitle: An overview of Kukudocs Javascript-based Document Viewer, how to download and use, basic features and examples, and more.
tutorial.page-desc1: This page shows you how to use the kukudocs js document viewer. Once you have learned how to use it, you can use the js-viewer to conveniently view the document!
tutorial.proceed: To use the JS-Viewer, proceed as follows.
tutorial.jsviewer.title: Use JS Document Viewer
tutorial.jsviewer.subtitle: No server! only Javascript - HTML5 document platform JS-Viewer.
tutorial.jsviewer.chap1.title: jQuery Included
tutorial.jsviewer.chap1.desc2: Please note that all JavaScript plugins require jQuery to be included, as shown in the Example.
tutorial.jsviewer.chap2.title: Get Download JS-Viewer Files
tutorial.jsviewer.chap2.desc1: Get the latest Kukudocs JS-Viewer Package(Javascript, CSS, HTML, etc...) source code by downloading it directly from Kukudocs Homepage.
tutorial.jsviewer.chap3.title: Insert Viewer Node
tutorial.jsviewer.chap3.desc1: Add a node to which the viewer will be rendered.
tutorial.jsviewer.chap4.title: Initialize JS-Viewer
tutorial.jsviewer.chap4.desc1: To use the js-viewer, you need to parse and render the file.
tutorial.jsviewer.chap4.desc2: The available Instances are DocxJS (docx), CellJS (xlsx), SlideJS (pptx).
tutorial.jsviewer.chap5.title: Sample Basic Example
tutorial.jsviewer.extension.title: Use Chrome Extension
tutorial.jsviewer.extension.desc1: If you're a Chrome user, try JS Document Viewer Extension.
tutorial.jsviewer.extension.desc2: You can easily view the document.
